name: newsapp
description: Python-based audio news app that tailors daily news summaries to your interests and listening history. It fetches recent news (24–48h), generates a concise 5–10 minute spoken brief using Gemini, avoids repetition via a FAISS RAG store, and asks for feedback to refine future briefs. Audio is generated with gTTS by default or Google Cloud Text-to-Speech if configured.
